Date.description: The date of the app installation/deletion report

App Apple Identifier.description: The unique identifier for the app in the App Store

Event.description: The type of event (Install, Delete, etc.)

Download Type.description: The type of download (Manual update, etc.)

Campaign.description: The marketing campaign associated with the event

Page Type.description: The type of page where the event originated

Page Title.description: The title of the page where the event originated

App Download Date.description: The date when the app was originally downloaded

Territory.description: The country or region where the event occurred

_ab_source_file_url.description: The path to the source file

processed_date.description: The date when this record was processed
